resources.string: This ID is not registered at %s. Get the ID from \"Devices\" tab of the control panel.
Select %s as a default launcher and check \'Always\':
Error connecting to %s. Please check the Internet connection and try again.

Please allow the app to draw over other windows.

This option helps better blocking unwanted apps, and enables emergency unlocking the kiosk mode.

Tap "Continue" to open a settings sheet. Find the "%s" item, grant the permission, and tap "Back".

Please allow the app to access usage data.

This option enables control of apps and settings.

This option may cause faster battery drain. To save battery, skip this option (use accessibility services or kiosk mode instead).

Tap "Continue" to open a settings sheet. Find the "%s" item, grant the permission, and tap "Back".
Please allow installation from unknown sources. A settings sheet will now open. Find \"Unknown sources\", allow the installation and click \"Back\".
MIUI requires manual setup of custom permissions. App permissions window will now open. Tap \"Other permissions\", allow \"Display pop-up windows while running in the background\" and click \"Back\".
MIUI requires manual setup of your device. On the info screen, TAP 7 TIMES ON \"BUILD NUMBER\". This will enable developer settings.
MIUI requires manual setup of your device. Developer settings window will now open. Scroll the screen down and uncheck \"MIUI optimization\".
Please allow the app to work in the device administrator mode. A Settings sheet will now open. Select \"Device administrators\", find the \"%s\" item, activate the administrator, and tap \"Back\".
Active app monitoring by the MDM application
Please allow the app to use accessibility services. A Settings sheet will now open. Find the \"%s\" item, allow to use accessibility services, and tap \"Back\".
Access to this app (%s) is blocked by the administrator. Click \'Home\' to proceed.
You are allowed to change settings within 3 minutes.
Network policies are cleared. You can now enable the network and reload the configuration.
Not enough rights to reboot the device.
The settings screen will open. Please turn on GPS location on this screen and click Back.
The settings screen will open. Please TURN OFF GPS location on this screen and click Back.
Mobile data are disabled! Please open the status bar and turn on mobile data.
Mobile data are enabled. Please open the status bar and TURN OFF mobile data.
Your password quality is not good enough. The settings screen will open. Please change the password and click Back.
Kiosk mode disabled: no permission to draw over other windows. Please allow %s to draw over other windows.
The app encountered an internal error. Please reboot the device and retry the action.
The configuration is not set, retrying to get from the server!
Close the admin panel to check and request permissions.
Please enter a valid server URL.
Quit due to server fault! Please fix the issue and restart %s, or remove it completely and reinstall.
The app requires the permissions to run. Please grant the requested permissions.
Cannot open the webpage because the browser is not found. Please add a browser app to the device configuration.
Invalid QR code contents. Please generate the provisioning QR code in the %s web panel.
This device has been locked by the administrator.
Oops, the launcher got an unrecoverable fault! Please contact your system administrator.
